ch0009_00_senri/0101_0701_01_10:
Hm? If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s good to see you today.
ch0009_00_senri/0101_0701_02_10:
When I see how much you or my son has grown
and accomplished, I can’t help but think I need
to train more, too.
ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_01_10: The Trainers of my Gym are all very powerful.
ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_02_10:
True strength acquired from proper practice
means not running from even the most difficult
of battles.
ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_03_10:
When you face a challenge, I want you to
answer it with all you’ve got!
ch0009_00_senri/0601_0702_01_10:
At my Gym, everyone battles each other
without ever holding back, all in the name
of growing stronger.
ch0009_00_senri/0601_0702_02_10:
I am no different. I am always thinking of new
ways to win in battle.
ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I run into my kid at the
Pokémon Center.
ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_02_10:
The other day I saw him wearing his clothes
inside out. Honestly, he can be so careless
sometimes. It reminds me of someone...
ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_03_10:
What? No, not me!
I’d never do something like wear my
clothes incorrectly!
ch0009_00_senri/0602_0702_02_10:
Whenever we see each other, we both look that
way, I suppose.
ch0009_00_senri/0602_0702_03_10:
Looking like that...
I feel like I should say something, but I just
end up laughing.
ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_01_10:
Slaking is very powerful, but he will start
loafing around right away. That’s his weakness.
ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_02_10:
I understand Slaking’s strong and weak points,
so I want to make the most of everything
he is able to do!
ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_03_10:
If you understand the strengths and
weaknesses of Pokémon, too,
battles will become much easier for you.
ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_01_10:
I don’t just mean your own Pokémon, either.
Knowing about all kinds of Pokémon is important.
ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_02_10:
If you do, you’ll be ready to counter against
any Pokémon’s strengths.
ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_03_10:
If you want to learn about Slaking’s power,
I’m ready to battle anytime!
ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a few other Pokémon besides
Slaking here, but they’re all back at home
looking after my Gym.
ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_02_10:
I wonder how they’re doing with the Trainers...
Not slacking off, I hope!
ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_03_10:
Blissey and Linoone are probably all right, but
Spinda’s eyes are always spinning around and it
has a tendency to wander off.
ch0009_00_senri/0604_0702_01_10: They’re all definitely training hard every day.
ch0009_00_senri/0604_0702_02_10:
That goes for people, too! It’s no different for
people or Pokémon! If you want to get stronger,
you can’t hold anything back!
ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_01_10:
Have you ever considered the emotions that come
with a battle’s end, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_02_10:
Happiness, sadness...
There are many different things you can feel.
ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_03_10:
All of those feelings become the foundation of
your strength, so remember them well.
ch0009_00_senri/0605_0702_01_10:
Losing, even when you battle with all
your might, is painful—even for adults.
ch0009_00_senri/0605_0702_02_10:
What I mean is that hating to lose is a
childish thing to do.
ch0009_00_senri/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve been looking for you!
I was thinking I wanted to give this to you.
ch0009_00_senri/1701_0701_02_10:
I think you’ll be able to put that to good use.
I’ll continue to keep supporting you.
ch0009_00_senri/1701_0702_01_10:
That gift I gave you a while ago?
You don’t have to worry about giving me
anything in return.
ch0009_00_senri/1701_0702_02_10:
I thought you could use it, so I gave it to you.
That’s all there is.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_01_10:
It may be surprising, but even I get worried
about things sometimes.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_02_10:
For example, when I go on a trip, I always
worry about what kind of souvenirs I should
bring back as gifts.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_03_10:
What, you thought it was a more serious
kind of worry? Well to me, that is serious.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s something that will travel far and be given
to someone. So I have to choose carefully.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_01_10:
To find a great gift, I actually did 
a bunch of research about Pasio.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_02_10:
There are just so many different things I’m sure
my family would like.
ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_03_10:
Hmm. I can’t decide. If you see something good,
let me know.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_01_10:
As a Trainer and as a Gym Leader, I’ve learned
many things.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_02_10:
But even so, I still feel like I’m not giving it 
my all. That’s why I’m participating in the PML.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_03_10:
Winning a battle isn’t easy. Especially since there
are so many strong Trainers like you around.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_04_10:
There’s a lot to learn! My hope right now is to
learn as much as I can from everyone.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_01_10:
Tactics and counter tactics are different between
regions and generations.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_02_10:
However, changing to whatever others do isn’t
actual strength.
A strong Trainer has unshakable conviction.
ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_03_10:
When I see you battle, I’m reminded of my son.
I think you two are similarly determined.
ch0009_00_senri/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Let’s give it our best effort today.
ch0009_00_senri/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning. Did you sleep well?
I’ll be counting on you today.
ch0009_00_senri/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten?
You must take care of your body.
ch0009_00_senri/3004_0701_01_10:
Time sure can fly in the afternoon.
Be careful not to waste too much of it.
ch0009_00_senri/3005_0701_01_10:
Days with you sure go by fast.
Make sure to rest up for tomorrow.
ch0009_00_senri/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s already getting dark. Watch your step,
and keep an eye out for nocturnal Pokémon.
